text: Yonrico Scott (October 6, 1955 â€“ September 20, 2019) was an American drummer and percussionist. He was a longtime member of the Grammy winning The Derek Trucks Band. He was the bandleader of the Yonrico Scott Band, and later worked with the Royal Southern Brotherhood, with Cyril Neville. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American rock drummers Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American gospel musicians Category:American songwriters Category:American bandleaders Category:Record producers Category:Musicians from Detroit Category:Writers from Detroit Category:Musicians from South Carolina Category:Writers from South Carolina Category:People from Greenville, South Carolina
title: Yonrico Scott
